name: The Last Unhaunted House
description:
The house on Aspen Lane isn't haunted, but Misty's still disappeared into it.

A short (<30min) adventure made for the Spooktober Spooktacular Game Jam.

     +Side Scroller Action Adventure

     +Unsubtle Social Commentary

     +Spooky (or uncanny?)

*Flash Warning - This game makes use of screen flashes, if that's something you try to avoid.

Credits:

     Made with RPGmaker MZ (Kadokawa/Degica)

     Additional Plugins: Galv (Diagonal Movement)

     Font: Kimberly Geswein (Indie Flower)

Known Issues:

Windy is Misty is Windy is Misty.
